subject: Puerto Ricans
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Monica Puig became the first Puerto Rican player to win a WTA title when she beat Silvia Soler-Espinosa of Spain, 6-4, 6-3, in the Strasbourg International final in France.
snippet: Monica Puig became the first Puerto Rican player to win a WTA title when she beat Silvia Soler-Espinosa of Spain, 6-4, 6-3, in the Strasbourg International final in France.
